mapper.insert: insert into reservation (p_code, rsvr_code, ss_code, rs_count, rs_time, rs_status) values (#{p_code}, #{rsvr_code}, #{ss_code}, #{rs_count}, now(), 0)
mapper.select: SELECT rs_num FROM reservation WHERE p_code = #{p_code} ORDER BY rs_time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM reservation WHERE rsvr_code = #{rsvr_code} and rs_status = 0
SELECT * FROM reservation WHERE rsvr_code = #{rsvr_code} and rs_status = 1
SELECT * FROM reservation r JOIN screening_schedule s ON r.ss_code = s.ss_code WHERE r.rsvr_code = #{rsvr_code} AND r.rs_status=1 ORDER BY r.rs_cancel_time DESC
